text: best indeed :) i never get tired of this
author: SirenoftheVoid

text: Something about playing my games straight through my SNES is just so much better though... I can't explain what it is. Little differences I suppose. The visuals and artifacts are different, the sound is different, the controller is different. I dunno. Also, Lufia 2 isn't even on Virtual Console so there's that. Speaking of which, I just bought Lufia 2 about a week ago! Hurray!

text: Just got the one on the DS. when this music came on I smiled. SNES version has better gameplay but i liked how the DS version told the story better. This song is STILL stuck in my head!
author: hawkssuns08

text:
UUUUUUGGHH...push the block, flip the switch, wait...no, I did it wrong.  Okay, start over.  Push this here, turn this one....wait....no....AGH!

Not that I hate the song.  MAN, though...nothing brings back memories of frustration like this game.  Couldn't just look up the answers online back then, either.  This game put you to WORK.

text: Respect for anyone that took the time to complete one of the hardest dungeons, EVER!
